item.title: Ebook Manipulation Tools
item.description: Ebook manager: Calibre Kindle PDF optimizer: k2pdfopt PDF Border Cropper Briss CHM File Extractor archmage PDF editing Xournal convert images to PDF sudo apt-get install imagemagick convert *.jpg pictures.pdf convert between different formats: sudo apt-get install calibre ebook-convert xxx.mobi xxx.txt --unsmarten-punctuation
